_comment: PACKAGE CONFIGURATION FOR ONLINE JUDGE BACKEND - This file defines the Node.js project configuration, dependencies, scripts, and metadata for the Online Judge backend application. It manages all external libraries, build processes, testing frameworks, and deployment scripts. Essential for project setup, dependency management, and CI/CD operations.
_description: DEPENDENCIES: Production dependencies include Express.js for server framework, MongoDB/Mongoose for database, JWT for authentication, bcrypt for password hashing, Passport for OAuth, Bull/Redis for job queues, helmet for security, and various middleware. Development dependencies include Jest for testing, nodemon for development, and migration tools.
_scripts: SCRIPTS: start (production server), dev (development with auto-reload), test (Jest test suite with coverage), seed (database seeding), check (configuration validation), migrate (database migrations), verify (system verification)
_usage: USED BY: Docker containers, CI/CD pipelines, npm/yarn package managers, development environments, production deployments, testing frameworks, and deployment scripts
name: online-judge-backend
description: Backend API for Online Judge Platform with JWT and OAuth Authentication

scripts.build:production: npm install --production && npm run migrate:up && npm run cleanup:production

author: CodeJudge Team
